Answers.MP Summary: adjust backlight brightness using RandR extension
Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Get the current screen brightness as a percentage
Top-3 Similar Questions: so_25588367: How to control backlight by terminal command
Top-3 Scripts:
so_25588367: xbacklight -inc 20     # increase backlight by 20%
 xbacklight -dec 30     # decrease by 30%
 xbacklight -set 80     # set to 80% of max value
 xbacklight -get        # get the current level

Explanations about Options.-dec: Decreases brightness by the specified amount.
Explanations about Options.-get:
Print out the current backlight brightness of each output with such a control. The
 brightness is represented as a percentage of the maximum brightness supported.
Explanations about Options.-set: Sets each backlight brightness to the specified level.
Explanations about Options.-inc: Increases brightness by the specified amount.
